title: Ahri legendary skin concept
body:
So I was browsing images because of my dreams of a legendary skin... And I found the most amazing skin concept.
I think this was made by someone called 'LucyL' Riot.. if you make an Ahri legendary skin in the future... this is what you should aim for.

Correct me if i'm wrong but, i'm pretty sure this is good enough to be Riot games levels of splash/concept art. And Ahri will one day get a legendary skin. I'm almost certain, She most likely won't get it for a long time because Arcade came out last year and she is getting some decent chromas. I guess everyone should just discuss if it's a good skin idea/concept/splash or not.

replies.body:
So far, every single skin Ahri has, is glaringly bright and colourful. Even foxfire Ahri, her more 'serious' skin is still quite bright and 'cute.'

While this does seem like a good piece of work, it also doesn't really bring anything new to Ahri? 

Personally, I don't want her next skin to be skanky and vibrant, I'd like something a little more... Violent?
maybe soulstealer/dark star Ahri is what you would be thinking of.

Very good ideas! I think Ahri would look fantastic in either of these themes.

They could even give her an ultimate skin that matches her(his, lol) lore, representing the shape shifting, male, seductive fox he really is.

Lol honesty soul stealer works well enough with her lore.

A little bit out there, but imagine an Ahri skin that allowed her to take on the form of the last champion she killed xD 
I understand this would be game breaking, but honestly it's be worth it to see Alistar spirit rushing around xD
As sekai said, definitely doesn't look like a legendary skin, probably more towards a 1350 skin. Also the body proportions are so off, her fox ears are too long.
that's why it's a 1350+ level skin, model changes.

we all know we'd prefer Citmer's Jade Princess Ahri


http://citemer.deviantart.com/art/Jade-Princess-Ahri-587620445

this would be a legendary skin and even though I can't play ahri, i'd buy her and the skin without a second thought. This has been made into a rather unimpressive custom skin, but the elegance of the design, the balance of the red, green and blue colour scheme, I just want this to be made into an official skin and it'd even fall into the jade warring kingdoms skin set.
not a big fan of the long nails, but other than that yeah that would be pretty good. still want to have a skin like that has foxfires as foxes.

That doesn't seem like a legendary skin (1820RP), maybe imperial skin (1350RP) or even just your epic skin (975RP).

But idk.

that was so fast... but if they modeled the foxfires like that it would be epic/imperial or higher.
and i call 1350 epic. imperial sounds in-between ultimate and legendary.

> and i call 1350 epic. imperial sounds in-between ultimate and legendary.

Yeah I'm not sure about how the skin tiers are called these days, I was just using what LoLWiki calls them. Hence why I listed the RP cost, because that conveys better.

According to Riot's official skin tier differentiation:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752874-Guide-to-Skin-Price-Tiers

> **1350 RP**
> Features: new model, new texture, new splash image, new animations, new visual effects, new sounds.
> Sometimes includes: processed voice overs.
> Examples: Blackthorn Morgana, Arcade Sona.
> 
> **1820 RP - Legendary skins**
> A legendary skin completely changes the look and feel of a champion.
> Features: new model, new texture, new splash image, new animations, new visuals, new voice over and sounds.
> Examples: Battlecast Prime Cho'Gath, Brolaf.

So I suppose unless this skin gets drastically different theme to the champion's original design (which this skin isn't as it's still the Nine Tail Fox, only Japanese themed as opposed to Korean themed) and new voice overs, otherwise it's a 1350RP skin.

Yeah... I can't imagine what her voice would be with this skin or what she would say. but riot always comes up with something random with voicelines.... (Nunu bot has the best voicelines ever though) but other than that you're right.
